name: The Skeld
description:
This is a recreation of "The Skeld" map from my YT video about Among Us. This is NOT A MULTIPLAYER GAME, you'll find ONLY THE MAP inside. I can't release the whole game due to legal reasons. 

However, if you want to explore the map by yourself - you can download it. Once you unzip it, you'll have The Skeld map to walk around, tasks and security cameras also work.

Input:

Q - do task, use cameras

T - show/hide task list

M - open map
